name: Big Movie Stars and Their Characters Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which box office star played Annette Hargrove, Elle Woods, and Vanessa Lutz?
questions.explanation:
Reese Witherspoon.

	Annette Hargrove was her character in "Cruel Intentions" (1999),  Elle Woods was her character in "Legally Blonde" (2001) and the sequal "Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde" (2003), and Vanessa Lutz was the role that she played in "Freeway" (1996).

questions.text: Which popular box office leading man played Paul Edgecomb, Joe Banks, and Rick Gassko?
questions.explanation:
Tom Hanks.

	Mr. Tom Hanks played Paul Edgecomb in the 1999 drama "The Green Mile".  His character of Joe Banks was from the 1990 comedy "Joe Versus the Volcano". Finally the character Rick Gassko was from the 1984 film "Bachelor Party".

questions.text: Which female box office superstar played the roles of Isabel Kelly, Darby Shaw, and Maggie Carpenter?
questions.explanation:
Julia Roberts.

	Isabel Kelly was Julia's character in the 1998 tearjerker "Stepmom".  Darby Shaw was her character in the 1993 drama "The Pelican Brief".  Finally her character Maggie Carpenter was her role in the 1999 comedy "Runaway Bride".

questions.text: Which funnyman played the characters Rayford Gibson, Billy Ray Valentine, and Kelly Robinson?
questions.explanation:
Eddie Murphy.

	Eddie Murphy played the role of Billy Ray Valentine in the 1983 comedy "Trading Places",  his role Rayford Gibson was from the 1999 film "Life", and finally his role Kelly Robinson was from the 2002 action film "I, Spy".

questions.text: Which blonde actress starred as Julie Gianni, Kimmy Wallace, and Tina Carlyle?
questions.explanation:
Cameron Diaz.

	Tina Carlyle was Cameron's first big role opposite Jim Carrey in the 1994 film "The Mask".  The role of Julia Gianni was from the 2001 drama opposite Tom Cruise in "Vanilla Sky".  Lastly, her role Kimmy Wallace was from the 1997 comedy "My Best Friend's Wedding".

questions.text: Which box office megastar played Randall "Memphis" Raines, Ronny Cammareri, and Charlie Lang?
questions.explanation:
Nicolas Cage.

	Nicolas Cage played Randall "Memphis" Raines in the 1999 action film "Gone in Sixty Seconds".  Nic starred opposite Cher in the 1987 romantic comedy "Moonstruck" as Ronny Cammareri.  Lastly, in one of his least successful films he starred opposite Bridget Fonda in the 1994 romantic comedy "It Could Happen to You" as police officer Charlie Lang.

questions.text: Which actress portrayed the characters Madison Lee, Diana Murphy, and Cassandra Eldrich?
questions.explanation:
Demi Moore.

	Cassandra Eldrich was Demi's character in the 1986 comedy "One Crazy Summer".  Diana Murphy was her character in the 1993 romantic drama "Indecent Proposal".  Lastly, Madison Lee is her character's name in the 2003 action comedy "Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle".

questions.text: Which 70's box office star played the characters Jack Horner, J.J. McClure, and Congressman David Dilbeck?
questions.explanation:
Burt Reynolds.

	J.J. McClure was Burt's character in "Cannonball Run" (1981) and its sequal "Cannonball Run II" (1984).  He portrayed Congressman David Dilbeck opposite Demi Moore in the comedy "Striptease" (1996).  Lastly, he portrayed Jack Horner in the 1997 film "Boogie Nights".  He was nominated for an Osacar for Best Supporting Actor for his work in "Boogie Nights".

questions.text: Which superstar portrayed the characters Frank T.J. Mackey, John Anderton, and Joel Goodson?
questions.explanation:
Tom Cruise.

	Tom played John Anderton in the 2002 science fiction flick "Minority Report".  The character Joel Goodson was his character in the memorable comedy from 1983's "Risky Business".  Finally, the role of Frank T.J. Mackey was his character in the 1999 drama "Magnolia".

questions.text: Which actor portrayed David Dunn, Joe Cornelius Hallenbeck, and James Urbanski?
questions.explanation:
Bruce Willis.

	James Urbanski was Bruce's character in the 1991 thriller "Mortal Thoughts".  Joe Cornelius Hallenbeck was his character in the 1991 action drama "The Last Boy Scout".  Lastly, David Dunn was his character in the 2000 film "Unbreakable".
